Text: Thank you TvTeam.  There is dialogue spoken in between "talking" scenes describing small actions ..... for blind "viewers."  VLC doesn't seem to be able to disable it.  The voice over is not too distracting and is not often.  A=10   V=10
its very distracting and flicking through the film he talks non stop.  wait for another copy
Thank you so much! I watched this movie with the descriptive audio and it tickled me. I searched for this. :) 10/10 movie with descriptive audio 9/10 original.
